meanings.definition: To loosen or undo a knot or tie.
meanings.sent1: She was untieing her shoelaces before going for a run.
meanings.sent2: He always struggles with untieing knots in his fishing line.
meanings.sent3: The magician was untieing knots in a hilarious attempt to escape.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a way of untieing the tightest emotional knots.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is untieing any obstacles in your path.

meanings.sent1: Untieing can be a satisfying task when you finally succeed.
meanings.sent2: I watched his untieing of the package with curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The untieing of the ribbon revealed a surprise gift inside.
meanings.sent4: His untieing of the mystery captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The untieing of the knot symbolized the end of their friendship.
